app_descript:
imo plus

Brief: Imo plus is an expansive and user-friendly messaging and social sharing platform. It allows users to craft stories with photos and videos, enhancing them with decorative elements like text, drawings, and stickers. These stories add a vibrant touch to your communications and vanish after a day, keeping your content fresh and engaging for your friends.
